content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, 0.0) that processes iron ore into iron plates.

### Second furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) that processes iron ore into iron plates.

### Third furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) that processes iron ore into iron plates.

### Wooden chest at position (8.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest (position 8.5, 0.5) for storing excess items.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the furnace is full, so check the inventory status before insertion.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure you have the required item in your inventory before attempting to place an entity. The error indicates that there was an attempt to place a wooden chest without having one in inventory.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have the required ingredients available in your inventory or in connected machines before attempting to craft items. The error indicates that the required sub-ingredient (iron-plate) was not available for crafting iron gear wheels.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has items available for extraction before attempting to extract. If the furnace is empty or has no items ready, the extraction will fail.

### Repeated errors when crafting iron gear wheels
- Ensure you have a sufficient quantity of iron plates in your inventory before attempting to craft iron gear wheels. The agent repeatedly encountered insufficient iron plates for crafting.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces that are not valid
- Ensure that the furnace you are attempting to extract from is valid and contains the required items. The error indicates that the agent attempted to extract from furnaces that did not have iron plates.

### Errors when inserting items into full furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the furnace is full, so check the inventory status before insertion.
